title: Oktoberfest Gragas Recall Animation Bug
body: It will not play the bar music in ARAM.  He just stands there and claps his hands to nothing. Now before you say "You can't recall in ARAM."... you can still press b to do the animation.  If you do Star Guardian Lux's recall in ARAM it does the music for her recall animation.  I want Gragas' music to play too!

replies.body:
Hi Malicious Fury, 

Yep, you can totally recall in ARAM! I've logged a ticket for this issue, and we'll look into it ASAP! :)
{{champion:79}} Have a barrell on me. "Let's get this party started!"
The only time I have a drinking problem is when I spill it. ;P

{{champion:79}} While you're drinking go check out Astronaut Teemo. When he sits still he floats forwards every 7 second or so. When he floats fowards (while sitting still) he enters into a weird transparent box.You can sort of see the edges of it in this [screenshot I took](http://imgur.com/a/516Yx). But it's much easier to see in your own client. Another bug!

Edit: This happens when he's facing southwest. Not sure if it happens every direction.

Heyyy again! 

Okay, so cool news, the audio should be fixed up by next patch. ^-^ Lemme look into that Teemo thing!
